divs: Sighting DetailsTHE DAY AFTER SUBMITTING REPORT TO YOU WE SAW A HOVERING FLASHING LIGHT IN THESKY. RED, GREEN AND WHITE RANDOMLY FLASHING LIGHTS THAT DO NOT MOVE. AS MANY AS5 SEPERATE OBJECTS SPREAD THROUGHOUT THE SKY, MILES APART. HAVE SEEN THESELIGHTS EVERY NIGHT SINCE 98. TONIGHT 911MOST VISIBLE LIGHT IS IN SAME PLACE ASEVERY OTHER NIGHT. ALSO NOTICED LIGHT THAT APPEARS TO BE OVER ROSWELL TONIGHT. ALL LIGHTS APPEAR TO BE IDENTICAL.
